descriptionlist.description: iOS 14's indicator dots brought to iOS 13
descriptionlist.longdescription:
Green = GPS in use
Yellow = Microphone in use
Red = Camera in use

*If the GPS indicator (green dot) does not go away try disabling "location based alerts" in system services and respringing your device*

~ This tweak DOES support devices with no notch
*There are no options to configure, it just works!*

Open source on my github

changelog.change: Fixed camera flickering when the device was locked
